snippet: A Nepali official says his country is not on the brink of collapse.
abstract: Letter from Amrit B Rai, minister counselor for the Permanent Mission of Nepal to the United Nations, comments on the Vanda Felbab-Brown June 6 Op-Ed article warning that Nepal is on the brink of collapse.
lead_paragraph: A Nepali official says his country is not on the brink of collapse.
